channel.title: CVE Feed for eID Easy -- eID Easy

item.title: CVE-2021-34650|2024-09-17T02:52:33.156Z -- eid%20easy -- eid%20easy
item.description: The eID Easy WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the error parameter found in the ~/admin.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 4.6.
